trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Armazena os recursos vinculados a ser enviado como parte de uma mensagem de email.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the LinkedResourceCollection class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da classe LinkedResourceCollection é retornada pelo <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose quando terminar de usar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose deixa a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>em um estado inutilizável.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>ocupado.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>em todos os modos de exibição nesta coleção.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
You do not need to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa chamá-la em seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada Dispose antes de liberar sua última referência a <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não são liberados até o coletor de lixo chama o <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>
